contentText.text: Please answer these questions about your role.

profilerQuestions.text: Do you interact with people or organizations that compete with Johnson Controls?
Are you responsible for making purchasing decisions for Johnson Controls?
Does your job involve marketing, sales or negotiating with customers and potential customers?
Do you have access to information about Johnson Controls customers, contractors, suppliers or business partners, or about any individuals who work for them?
Do you have access to information about Johnson Controls employees?
Do you deal directly with Johnson Controls employees, customers or suppliers that are based overseas or have access to technical information?
Does your job involve international travel, hosting international visitors or transporting Johnson Controls products, people or information to overseas locations?
Do you participate in an industry trade association or attend industry conferences?
Do you ever give gifts to third parties or receive gifts from third parties, such as customers or suppliers?
Do you ever entertain third parties or are you ever entertained by third parties, such as customers or suppliers?
Does your work involve researching, developing or engineering Johnson Controls products and services?
Are you responsible for developing business with new or existing customers in new locations or in new industries?

instructionText.text: Select Yes or No for each question then click on Continue.
